error.name: I18N_ERROR_MISSING_RESOURCE
error.msg: The requested resource cannot be found

error.name: I18N_ERROR_INVALID_FORMAT
error.msg: Data format is not what is expected

error.name: I18N_ERROR_FILE_ACCESS
error.msg: The requested file cannot be found

error.name: I18N_ERROR_INTERNAL_PROGRAM
error.msg: Indicates a bug in the library code

error.name: I18N_ERROR_INDEX_OUTOFBOUNDS
error.msg: Trying to access the index that is out of bounds

error.name: I18N_ERROR_INVALID_CHAR_FOUND
error.msg: Character conversion: Unmappable input sequence. In other APIs: Invalid character

error.name: I18N_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW
error.msg: A result would not fit in the supplied buffer

error.name: I18N_ERROR_COLLATOR_VERSION_MISMATCH
error.msg: Collator version is not compatible with the base version

error.name: I18N_ERROR_USELESS_COLLATOR
error.msg: Collator is options only and no base is specified

error.name: I18N_ERROR_NO_WRITE_PERMISSION
error.msg: Attempt to modify read-only or constant data

error.name: I18N_ERROR_RESOURCE_TYPE_MISMATCH
error.msg: An operation is requested over a resource that does not support it

error.name: I18N_ERROR_TOO_MANY_ALIASES
error.msg: Too many aliases in the path to the requested resource

error.name: I18N_ERROR_MESSAGE_PARSE
error.msg: Unable to parse a message

error.name: I18N_ERROR_PARSE
error.msg: Equivalent to Java ParseException

error.name: I18N_ERROR_TRUNCATED_CHAR_FOUND
error.msg: Character conversion: Incomplete input sequence

error.name: I18N_ERROR_ILLEGAL_CHAR_FOUND
error.msg: Character conversion: Illegal input sequence/combination of input units

error.name: I18N_ERROR_INVALID_TABLE_FORMAT
error.msg: Conversion table file found, but corrupted

error.name: I18N_ERROR_INVALID_TABLE_FILE
error.msg: Conversion table file not found

error.name: I18N_ERROR_ILLECAL_ESCAPE_SEQUENCE
error.msg: ISO-2022 illegal escape sequence

error.name: I18N_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_ESCAPE_SEQUENCE
error.msg: ISO-2022 unsupported escape sequence

error.name: I18N_ERROR_NO_SPACE_AVAILABLE
error.msg: No space available for in-buffer expansion for Arabic shaping

error.name: I18N_ERROR_CE_NOT_FOUND
error.msg: Currently used only while setting variable top, but can be used generally

error.name: I18N_ERROR_PRIMARY_TOO_LONG
error.msg: User tried to set variable top to a primary that is longer than two bytes

error.name: I18N_ERROR_STATE_TOO_OLD
error.msg: ICU cannot construct a service from this state, as it is no longer supported

error.name: I18N_ERROR_ENUM_OUT_OF_SYNC
error.msg: UEnumeration out of sync with underlying collection

error.name: I18N_ERROR_INVARIANT_CONVERSION
error.msg: Unable to convert a UChar* string to char* with the invariant converter

error.name: I18N_ERROR_INVALID_STATE
error.msg: Requested operation can not be completed with ICU in its current state

error.name: I18N_ERROR_MALFORMED_SET
error.msg: A UnicodeSet pattern is invalid

error.name: I18N_WARNING_STRING_NOT_TERMINATED
error.msg: String not terminated with NULL

error.name: I18N_ERROR_STD3_ASCII_RULES
error.msg: Argument does not satisfy STD3 rules

error.name: I18N_ERROR_UNASSIGNED
error.msg: Unassigned code points are found

error.name: I18N_WARNING_SORT_KEY_TOO_SHORT
error.msg: Number of levels requested in getBound is higher than the number of levels in the sort key
